abstract: The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 1080 costs about as much as a large-screen TV and lets you project a 100-inch HD picture on any wall.
snippet: The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 1080 costs about as much as a large-screen TV and lets you project a 100-inch HD picture on any wall.
lead_paragraph: HDTVs are becoming cheaper every day, but high-definition projectors have long been priced with King Midas and his cohort in mind. The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 1080, however, costs about as much as a large-screen TV and lets you project a 100-inch HD picture on any wall.

headline.main: A High-Definition Projector That Competes on Price
headline.print_headline: A High-Definition Projector That Competes on Price
